custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user attempts to purchase tickets with an iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air 2, and iPad mini 3 
And has Apply Pay enabled in the device's Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see "Apple Pay" as a payment option

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user attempts to purchase tickets with an iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air 2, and iPad mini 3 
And has Apply Pay disabled in the device's Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then "Apple Pay" will not appear as an option in the payment options drop-down menu

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user attempts to purchase tickets with an iPhone 5S or later model
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then "Apple Pay" will not appear as an option in the Payment Options drop-down menu

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user attempts to purchase tickets 
And has never made a purchase/added a card on the device
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then "Apple Pay" will be selected by default in the Payment Options drop-down menu

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user attempts to purchase tickets 
And has previously made a purchase/added a card on the device
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then "Apple Pay will be first in the list of Payment Options

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects "Apple Pay" from the payment options
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the checkout screen
And the user will see a "Buy with Apple Pay" button

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects "Apple Pay" from the payment options
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then text will display beneath the "Buy with Apple Pay" button that reads "Tapping Buy with Apple Pay will charge your credit card."

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects "Apple Pay" from the payment options
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the card security field shall remain disabled

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user selects "Apple Pay" from the payment options
And taps "Buy with Apple Pay"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be presented with the checkout screen with their order information and delivery options

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user selects "Apple Pay" from the payment options
And taps "Buy with Apple Pay"
And the checkout screen is presented
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user can select a card and edit delivery options
